mapper.insert: insert into db_work(wno,cno,wname,description,start_time,end_time,updatetime,remark1,remark2) select #{wno},#{cno},#{wName},#{desc},#{start_time},#{end_time},#{updateTime},'预留','预留' from DUAL where not exists( select * from db_work where db_work.wno = #{wno} )
mapper.select: select sw.wno '作业号',w.wname '作业名',c.cno '所属课程号',c.cname '所属课程名',t.tno '开课老师号',t.tname '开课老师',w.start_time '起始时间',w.end_time '截止时间',sw.times '剩余提交次数',sw.iscorrect '是否批改',sw.score '评分',sw.ispublish '是否公布',sw.studentworkname '提交作业文件名' from db_course c,db_teacher t,db_work w,db_studwork sw where sw.sno = #{username} and sw.wno = w.wno and w.cno = c.cno and c.tno = t.tno order by sw.times desc;
mapper.update:
update db_studwork sw
sw.studentworkname = #{studentWorkName},
sw.subtime = #{subTime},
sw.times = #{times},
sw.iscorrect = #{isCorrect},
sw.comment = #{comment},
sw.score = #{score},
sw.updatetime = #{updateTime},
sw.ispublish = #{isPublish},
where sw.sno = #{username} and sw.wno = #{wno};
